tool_description: Aligns multiple time series datasets with potentially different timestamps, handling timezone conversions and synchronizing data for multi-asset analysis.

primary_dataset.description: Path to primary dataset that serves as time reference

secondary_datasets.description: Paths to secondary datasets to align with primary

alignment_method.description: Timestamp alignment method (exact, nearest, forward_fill, interpolate)

error_messages: Invalid dataset paths: One or more dataset paths cannot be accessed
Timestamp column missing: All datasets must have a timestamp column
Unsupported alignment method: Use supported methods (exact, nearest, forward_fill, interpolate)
Invalid tolerance format: Use format like '1min', '5min', '1h'
Timezone not recognized: Use valid timezone identifiers (UTC, US/Eastern, etc.)
Insufficient overlap: Datasets have insufficient time overlap for meaningful alignment
usage: Provide primary dataset path and array of secondary dataset paths. Configure alignment method, tolerance, and timezone as needed. Returns synchronized multi-asset dataset.

common_timeframe.description: Start and end timestamps of common data period

alignment_summary.description: Summary of alignment process and any issues encountered

synchronized_rows.description: Number of synchronized time periods in final dataset
